name: Thomas Woodard
text: Good location to come in and pay bill.

name: Nathanael Zurinsky
text: Hands down, this is the best company in town for all your gas needs.  They go above and beyond the call of duty especially when no other company is willing to go the extra mile, even after you tell them that you would be willing to pay extra. If you want a dependable company who will give it to you straight and not let you down, no need to look anywhere else.  They made a customer for life by just being willing to help my family out during my deployment.  They bend over backwards and support the military.  I would recommend them to anyone and will remain loyal for life.  I simply cannot say enough good things about them.  I especially want to say a personal thank you from the bottom of my heart to the manager Mr. Billy Brown who literally went out of his way to help my family and I.  Your kindness and generosity will not be forgotten.

name: Lee Wood
text: Was very friendly. I made a dumb mistake and did not check my gas levels and they fit me in last minute.

name: michael schulte herrshultz@aol.com
text: Not the company we started with 20 yrs ago. Enough said, they cant keep good help and bookkeeping is a thing of the past of witch you pay for their lack of attention to service

name: Karla Jarman
text: I have been with them over 20 years.  Took 3 weeks to get gas... was told “I was only one if 4000 customers”. (Like I was being selfish).  Then they charged my card $89 too much.  Will look into other companies during summer.

name: Margaret Mazikowski
text:
Started a job never finished. No calls to let me know. Now I wonder how long it will take to get them to come it it.
If not picked up Monday it will be on the curb.
NEVER DO BUSINESS WITH SUCH A COMPANY AGAIN.
Told me 3 different stories today. Sad thing.

name: Chris Stephens
text: Worse gas company ever! Their tank that I pay to rent leaked out 100 gallons of gas over a period of time.They sent someone out to check the tank for a leak, while talking to me on the phone and telling me the tank was not leaking and saying they would have to do a leak test in my house at no charge ,my wife had to show the guy that the tank was leaking. They fixed the tank the next day and told me they would only reimburse me for 25% of what was in there. A week later I got a bill in the mail for $100 for them coming out and fixing their property. Called the main office and a guy called me back and basically called me a liar and said that he wouldn't have given me any gas back. This company has horrible customer service at a store level and at a regional level. STAY AWAY FROM THIS PLACE!!!

name: Wesley Key
text: I called for a price.  Was told $2.24 per gallon.  I arrived and had my 100 Lb cylinder refilled.  A the cash register, filling my 100 Lb cylinder was "$65 per refill".  I only needed $30 in propane to fill my cylinder.  Cashier tried to argue with me.  Deceptive practice.

name: Kiliaen Anderson
text: This company is outstanding.  They have gained a customer for life.  Not only were they honest about how the gas cost fluctuates over the year, they advised me on how much would last me until the prices dropped (since this is the most expensive time of year).  Additionally, I had 3 techs here at once, as a first time client they check everything, re-lit everything (we had run out of gas) and made sure I clearly understood our system.  I don't give fives easily...but this company would get a 10 if possible.  Incredibly thorough.  Thank you Larry, Jeremy, John and Kristy.

name: Rita Cloud
text: Courteous service.

name: Mark Williams
text: All-Gas Propane is the worst establishment I have ever encountered in my life. They have no sense of organization or intelligence. I question how this company even functions day-to-day. When trying to do business, the Office Manager, I cannot remember her name, was the most rude and inappropriate person I have ever dealt with. The way she speaks to people, including her co-workers, is derogatory and extremely unprofessional. This company needs serious re-evaluation by someone who knows how to run a business!

name: Mary Norman
text: Great customer service. Very helpful on my gas logs. Thanks so much !!

name: Jen Menon
text: Absolutely terrible all around. Tried to organize tank service and fill and after not hearing anything for 2 days and finally getting in touch with someone, Jeremy told us that this was turning out to be too complicated and we should go somewhere else. Well, we will. And hopefully you will too. If I could give fewer stars than 1, I would.

name: J C
text: Not very friendly.

name: Cindy Mull
text: I had a 40 pound propane tank filled, 8.4 gallons and was charged $45.00. This is $5.36 per gallon! Called Tractor Supply and was quoted #2.79 per gallon.  From now on, I will be a Tractor Supply customer!

name: Art Sharpe
text:
They unlawfully STOLE the propane tank with its contents from my home and have refused to return it in spite of multiple promises to do so.  At the time they STOLE the tank and its contents, i had a $15.00 CREDIT with them.

I am filing a criminal complaint for the theft with the Madison County Sheriff this evening.

Worst customer service EVER.  Use any propane supplier BUT them.

name: Drake Maxwell
text: Now these folks sure know something about customer service!  Christy is great!  She takes the time to answer your questions and work out the right propane service for your needs.

name: Kevin Edmondson
text: Would be nice if they actually had someone to fill bottles

name: Kourtney Stephens
text: Customer service is awful especially their corporate office.

name: henry smith
text: Not a smidgen of customer concern/service trace, I  entered one door, customer care/service went out the other.  Any competitors willing to do better I'm  all in !!!

name: Steve Tangeman
text: Hours of operation say they are open.   But when I arrived they were closed with no sign saying otherwise.   Poor management.

name: Chris Bloomfield
text: They can fill my tank, but not until closing time? What kind of two bit operation is this?

name: аварийный монтер Hunter
text: Avoid them. I went with their competitors.

name: Lorin Sumpter
text: The welding supplies you need are waiting patiently with a good staff to assist.

name: George Glass
text: Great people that work their

name: David Welch
text: Great Staff , great prices , always willing to help you , no matter what you are doing !

name: David Kilburn
text: They gave me a great deal on a long handle Smith torch. Very much appreciated

name: James Freeman
text: The best ever

name: Tony Studdard
text: Great customer service. Friendly and personal.

name: Theresa Perdue
text:
The staff is very friendly and prices are great.
I went to exchange some tanks we had bought my husband as I was walking into business they were actually on the phone with him.

name: Xquizet
text: As long as you speak with management you can get things resolved pretty quickly

name: Albert Turley
text: Went ther las week for safety glasses & they said they would order they ! Still not in ! !  - don't believe they did Order !

name: Mark H
text: This is a difficult company to work with.  They do not respond to the needs of their customers.  I am very disappointed with their customer service.

name: Ricky Montgomery
text: Great service.

name: William Wheat
text: Good stock of welding supplies, a little pricey and employees not very helpful

name: Marco Antonio Peregrina Sauce
text:
(Translated by Google) Excellent service

(Original)
Excelente servicio

name: Randy Wolf
text: Fast and friendly service. The guys at the city sales desk answered all my questions  professionally and in great detail that made me feel as if I was getting advice from a long time friend.

name: Barry Johnson
text: Super nice folks, great prices.  It is worth the drive to find these guys

name: William Leake
text: Prompt service, got me in and out in no time ,Thanks

name: Rick Maze
text: Good staff. Good selection. Price is high but they can work with you on it.

name: Scott Suttle
text: Knowledgeable staff.

name: Dennis Turnbaugh
text: Store great, employees werent to helpful! No prices on products and they made it seem like it was a Hassle to look a price up for me... So i didnt stay long and purchased my list elsewhere. Which was a $800 list. Other than that my experience was good!

name: William McPherson
text: Great employees that really help you out!! They have any gas that you need. Thanks

name: Mike Hump
text: Good store well stocked service a little slow

name: Mark Turner
text: The men behind the counter,answered the call,gave me the info I needed,and was there with the parts I was in search of!

name: Grace Dyal
text: Seems like the sales person was learning, but did good job. They had to order lens which was supposed to come to my house but he called and told me they were delivered to the store instead.  He was going to resend them them to my address, but I was going to be in Sylacauga the next day so I asked him to keep them and I would and did come by and get them.

name: Matt Dodgen
text: Price double between a phone quote and the time it took me to get there

name: Eric Cook
text: Just seemed a little high $134 to fill a tank of Argon??

name: Kim Kimbrough
text: Great people

name: Eric Dumas
text: Great service alot of hard to find ironworker tools and plenty of welding supplies

name: BOSS HOG Torque Converters
text: They were very helpful and listened to what I really needed.  I would suggest that you check them out. Welding is what we do.

name: Jack Horton
text: They have drove the price up as of late .will go to young welding next time.

name: Roger1967 Roger1967
text: Very helpful
